sentence: Rep. Cheney is running for re-election against primary challenger Harriet Hageman, who has been endorsed by former President Donald Trump.
author: Rebecca Downs
title: Former Rep. Hosting Fundraiser for Liz Cheney, Even Though He Works for Jan. 6 Select Committee

sentence: Cheney faces Trump-endorsed challenger Harriet Hageman in an August primary this year, though she continues to break personal fundraising records.
author: Emily Brooks
title: Push to oust Cheney and Kinzinger from GOP simmers in Congress as RNC debates it

sentence: House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy has endorsed attorney Harriet Hageman in her 2022 midterm primary challenge against Wyoming Rep. Liz Cheney.
author: Asher Notheis
title: Kevin McCarthy endorses Liz Cheney primary challenger
